hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Mirror Shield# can be found in #the Market#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Hover Boots#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Red Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Second Room Upper Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that in a grotto with a #spider and a cow# you will find...^ #a Bow# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Goron Tunic#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #the Key#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides #Know-It-All Brothers' House#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the path to Termina is a one-way trip.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: May the way of the Hero lead to the Triforce.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #0# major items.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern MQ Iron Boots Chest

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombs (10 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #Dodongo's Cavern# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides a #Slingshot Shooting Gallery#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Bombchus (10 pieces)# can be found in #the Market#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #a Bomb Bag# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Heart Container#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Hylian Shield#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Ice Arrows Chest

LW (Bridge).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

SFM (Saria).text: Are you stuck? Try asking for help in our Discord server or check out our Wiki!

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #0# major items.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Red Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Heart Container#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Hover Boots#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #the Prescription#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Early Silver Rupee Chest

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #Great Fairy Fountain#.
